column1: Notes in here:  e.g. Multiple choice questions don't need question mark since the entire sentence needs to be synthesized. e.g. The score associated with each trait can be any number and not limited to 1 and -1. e.g. Currently, we only support up to two options.
Which words best describe your attitude with respect to others?
Do strangers find it takes some time to get to know you?
Which term best describes your outlook on life?
Should laws be enforced uniformly for everyone and without exception for any single individual?
Are you a very neat and organized person?
Are you comfortable going with the flow and letting others take charge?
How do you prefer to spend your evenings?
Do you believe in mind over matter?
Do you like to keep your options open?
